metadata.name: Red Midnight Special
metadata.description:
Title: “Red Midnight Special”

Project: “West Safari”

Artist: Francesco Aglieri Rinella

Medium: Kodak Portra 100T - Mamiya RZ67

Description: 

“Lone Pine, California, 17 May 2022.
The sun was down and lights were up, like a dream. The Motel sign seeped into anything around us”
_______________________________________
About The Project:

4000km, in the extreme West of the United States of America, traveled "on the road".
The importance of moving with the body, but above all with the mind, guides me to the freedom of expression through photography, today an essential tool of my daily life.
The search for light gives me an unstoppable desire to compose and document what my eyes see through my camera, which becomes a window into the present of a new and engaging reality.
